basics.name: Zeng Yang
basics.summary: A worker with a spirit of solidarity, collaboration, innovation and struggle

work.name: Leo Burnett Shanghai Advertising Co., Ltd.
work.summary: I am mainly involved in FMCG brand artist official announcement and new product launch projects, responsible for the communication of creative brief, and information collection, analysis and organization. At the same time, I was also responsible for the production of KV materials and helped to think of creative ideas for scripts.

awards.title: National Third Prize of the 7th China International College Students’ “Internet+” InnovationandEntrepreneurship Competition
awards.summary: Responsible for new media operation, in weibo, microblogging, small red book and other platforms to traditional culture as the positioning of content production.
